answers: Using the "sign in" button in the left sidebar.

Tutorial.prompt: How do you mark a problem for review?
answers: Change the symbol to the left of the submit button.

Tutorial.prompt: If you don't know how to answer a question you can click the orange button to see the solution. If you click the orange button and then the blue button the problem will be completed.
Tutorial.solution: You can always click the "Solution" button to view the correct answer.
